promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic legendary bison steel-type pokemon wearing dark gemstones. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or bison. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemsurge, a a dynamic legendary bison steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Muscular Nose, Drawup Power. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bison", "steel" or "Gemsurge". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, bison-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey galaxy background
generatedDescription: Meet the mighty Gemvigor, a legendary emblem of endurance. Thriving in arid lands, it channels its Muscular Nose to mine ores and Drawup Power to triumph battles.
